ch.zhaw.it15a_zh.psit3_03.mealmanager.adapters

Class ShoppingListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ShoppingListAdapter.ShoppingListHolder>
      • ch.zhaw.it15a_zh.psit3_03.mealmanager.adapters.ShoppingListAdapter

  • public class ShoppingListAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ShoppingListAdapter.ShoppingListHolder>
    The ShoppingListAdapter is responsible for putting the shoppinglistitems into an adapter which will converts the several shoppinglistitems (arrayList) into a viewable list in ShoppingListViewActivity with the according buttons, name and amount (=> shortly said responsible for preparing the content).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ShoppingListAdapter.ItemClickCallback 
      (package private) class  ShoppingListAdapter.ShoppingListHolder
      Holder class which defines the layout of the cardview.

        Increases the amount of the specific shoppinglistitem. shoppinglistitem will be updated in the list and in the DB.
        Parameters:
        item - shoppinglistitem on which the amount should be increased.
        increase - certain number for increasing the amount of the specific shoppinglistiem.

      • changeBought

        public void changeBought(ShoppingListItem item)

        Parameters:

        amount - item amount
        unit - g,kg, ml, l, St√ºcke

      • deleteItemFromList

        public void deleteItemFromList(int position)

        Parameters:
        position - position of the shoppingListItem in the arrayList
